mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Lovell, R. C. M. to Pierpont, Francis H.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Lovell, R. C. M.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Gov. FH Peirpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] Wheeling Aug 20 1861. By Telegraph from Pomeroy " " 1861. The Company of sharp shooters raised on Elk River is full numbering one hundred & one 101. have you those rifles. I have ordered them to Mason City to be mustered answer RCM Lovell 30W130&105Col [page 2] RCM Lovell
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Lovell, R. C. M.
Pomeroy, Ohio
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis H.
